title: Repealing acts; certain laws not affected
description: A repealing act shall not affect:

1.description: Any law funding the territorial or state debt.

2.description: Any law authorizing the issuance of, funding of, or payment of principal or interest on, territorial bonds, bonds of the state, bonds of an agency, institution, department or political subdivision of the state, or bonds of a county, city, town or municipal corporation.

3.description: Any act incorporating or chartering municipal corporations.
